long_label: P17 Vsx2-GFP sorted mouse bipolar retina cells 1 (Batch 1)

protocols.description: suspensions were processed through Drop-Seq to generate single-cell cDNA libraries attached to microbeads. Microbeads were counted, and amplified by PCR, and the 3' end of the cDNA prepared for sequencing using a modified Nextera XT protocol.
